definitions.definition: A geographic region encompassing the Pontic-Caspian steppe in Eastern Europe and Central Asia , inhabited by nomadic Scythians from at least the 11th century BCE to the 2nd century CE .

main_definition: ( historical ) A geographic region encompassing the Pontic-Caspian steppe in Eastern Europe and Central Asia , inhabited by nomadic Scythians from at least the 11th century BCE to the 2nd century CE .
